item.title: Question....pretty spazzy but idk
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Nate Mod Nate
item.description:
@Mod_Nate wrote:

well for your first question once people join your server then you go to characters file and then click on their name and find where it says rights = 0 and change it to 1 for mod and 2 for admin.

Second question : use ::pnpc

Read full topic
